description:
ESTIMATE FWHM SMOOTHNESS OF A METRIC FILE.

Estimates the smoothness of the metric columns, printing the estimates to standard output.  These estimates ignore variation in vertex spacing.

roi-metric.description:
use only data within an ROI

the metric file to use as an ROI

column.description:
select a single column to estimate smoothness of

the column number or name

demean.description:
estimate for the whole file at once, not each column separately

subtract the mean image before estimating smoothness

surface.description: the surface to use for distance and neighbor information
